Title: Kao no nai Tsuki
Description: ['Suzuna is the only daughter of the Kuraki family. She is training hard to become a priestess. Tomomi brings her to the house of her husband-to-be. The mansion is under a strange spell, releasing the sexual desires of everyone inside. ']
Characters: ['Kuraki, Suzuna', 'Hayama, Koichi', 'Kuraki, Mizuna', 'Harukawa, Tomomi', 'Kuraki, Yuriko', 'Kurihara, Sayaka']
Staff: [['Araki, Hideki', 'Storyboard'], ['Carnelian', 'Original Character Design'], ['Ishihara, Keiji', 'Animation Director, Character Design'], ['Hattori, Noritomo', 'Animation Director']]
